Name: Shabti of Pinudjem II
Description: Shabti of the first prophet of Amun, Pinudjem II. The wig, impelments and the head band have been painted in black. It has an inscription in six horizontal lines, reproducing the traditional Chapter 6 of the Book of the Dead. The shabti comes from the Royal Cachette. It was placed there three days after the arrival of the last royal mummies, in year 10 of Siamun.
